channel.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
channel.description:
Hi,
I just had to make a topic about this. Tutorial Island was a big part of my early R|S career. Due to a recent update involving the Wizard's Tower, it has been removed to make room for a larger island for the tower to sit on. Even though it hasn't been used in a while for anything, it doesn't seem right to open the world map to find it does not exist anymore. What are you guys' thoughts about this?
-ghostly150

item.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Well, i don’t believe the tutorial island was a waste. It showed you the basic skills on how to fight, make armour, catch and cook food and cut wood. The rest of the skills were up to you to figure out, ask people in the community and maybe even make friends. If they were to show you everything how are you meant to socialise other then trolling.

Read full topic

item.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

The old tutorial was a hands on and in depth guide for those who are new to the type of game Runescape is and how to use it’s systems. If you weren’t new to it, you could finish it in roughly 10 minutes at most. I’ll agree it was a little long, and I could see it being annoying if you were making a new character, but think about it, you’re probably gonna put over 100 hours into training a pure, so what’s 10 minutes so they can continue gaining players at the same rate without them logging out after 10 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

The old tutorial was annoying to do but yeah, it was kind of everyone’s first memory when RS got brought up. (whether they actually played the game or not)
What was annoying in the old system is that you didn’t have tutorials for all of the member skills which could have been helpfull to people new to the game.
I don’t how it is now but I preferred the dragon tutorial. It was short and it gave you the core ideas/principle thoughts about how the game works and that had given the player enough information to figure the rest out by himself.
Do think of the task system though; it drags new player into unknown content and lets the player find out for himself how it all works.

Read full topic

item.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Tutorial Island was a waste. It didn’t even go over all of skills whenever I first started playing RuneScape. The current tutorial goes into much more detail for new players.

A good game shouldn’t require that much of a tutorial.
Runescape-This is what happens when you spoon feed.

Read full topic

item.title: Well... Tutorial Island is gone :S
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:473169”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=591077.msg4181538#msg4181538 date=1355596134]
I hated the original tutorial island, what a waste of time.
[/quote]
I kind of have to agree. To an extent. It’s dialogues were annoying, they had so much (Lol I’m writing the 09 tutorial up…)
But the new one is just annoying too. I wish they had a “skip tutorial” option. They have one for the members tutorial. Not for the other one. Not to my knowledge at least.[/quote]If the tutorial now is still killing that ugly dragon, then yes they do have one.

Read full topic
